Scratch Plugin Store

Manage and create plugins for Scratch with ease

What is Scratch Plugin Store?

Scratch Plugin Store is a tool designed for Scratch enthusiasts to easily manage plugins. Users can install, update, and remove plugins or even create their own repositories!

Features

  • Install Plugins: Easily install plugins using their package ID.
  • Update Plugins: Keep all your plugins up-to-date with a single command.
  • Remove Plugins: Delete unnecessary plugins to free up space.
  • List Installed Plugins: View all the plugins you have installed.
  • Create Plugins: Build your own plugins with auto-generated templates.

Commands

Here are the commands supported by Scratch Plugin Store:

  • install [packageID] - Install a plugin by its ID.
  • update [packageID] - Update an existing plugin.
  • remove [packageID] - Remove a plugin by its ID.
  • list - List all installed plugins.
  • exit - Exit the Plugin Manager.

How to Use

  1. Download and run ScratchPluginManager.bat.
  2. Use the commands mentioned above to manage plugins.
  3. To create a new plugin, use the create [packageID] command.

Repository

Visit the official repository on GitHub: ScratchPluginStore.
